name: Too Hot to Handle 3
summary: This interactive narrative adventure includes a bevy of new features, but the goal remains the same as before: flirt, tease, and instigate your way to the finish line with as much of the game’s virtual $200,000 prize pot intact — all while keeping your carnal desires to a minimum.
